participant_1.background:
I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.
I am doing well in school, thank you for asking.
i hate my parents , but i love my job.
i hate to lose.

participant_2.background:
Yes, I have four dogs.
and also love drawing.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i m in my last year of grad school.
i grew up in the deep south.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there! How's your day going?
Good! Just finished my shift at my music store. How is your day going?
Good! I'm in my last year of grad school. I'm working on my research paper.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying art history. I love learning about different cultures and their art.
That's really cool! I love drawing too. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little, but now that they're all in school, I'm opening up my own music store.
That's awesome! I love that you're following your passion.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it. I'm also taking some classes to learn more about business.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and pop.
Me too! I love music that makes me feel good.
Me too! I love to sing and dance to music.
Me too! I love to dance. I used to take dance lessons when I was younger.
That's awesome! I wish I had taken dance lessons when I was younger.
It was a lot of fun! I miss it sometimes.
Me too! Maybe we should take some dance lessons together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to dance with you.
Great! We can set up a time to go dancing sometime.
Sounds good! I'll look forward to it
